ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Have you had either a full-time or part-time job, or were you self-employed, at any time in the past three years?
Notes: 1=Yes; 2=No in past 3 years; 9=Missing; -97=Missing Online; -98=Purposely Skipped Online

ElementDescription: Please rate the extent to which you engaged in each of these behaviors in the past three years: Found additional productive work to do when your normally scheduled duties were completed.
Please rate the extent to which you... Looked for opportunities to learn new knowledge and skills from others at work and from new and challenging job assignments.
Please rate the extent to which you... Persisted with unusually high levels of effort, determination and stamina to complete work tasks successfully despite very difficult conditions or obstacles.
Please rate the extent to which you... Asked for additional or more challenging work assignments.
Please rate the extent to which you... Consistently completed work on or ahead of time, even when deadlines seemed impossibly short.
Please rate the extent to which you... Stayed with the organization despite hardship.
Please rate the extent to which you... Showed sincere pride and enthusiasm for the organization.
Please rate the extent to which you... Actively embraced the organization's missions and objectives.
Please rate the extent to which you... Talked with others outside of work about the organization's positive features.
Please rate the extent to which you... Offered constructive suggestions for work-place improvement.
Please rate the extent to which you... Refused to take on a job assignment because it was the responsibility of another co-worker.
Please rate the extent to which you... Was courteous and tactful with co-workers, even when busy or stressed.
Please rate the extent to which you... Volunteered to help a co-worker meet a difficult deadline.
Please rate the extent to which you... Purposely held back information that would have helped a coworker.
Please rate the extent to which you... Went out of my way to congratulate others at work for their achievements.
Please rate the extent to which you... Made fun of someone at work.
Please rate the extent to which you... Said something hurtful to someone at work.
Please rate the extent to which you... Made an ethnic, religious or racial remark at work.
Please rate the extent to which you... Cursed at someone at work.
Please rate the extent to which you... Played a mean prank on someone at work.
Please rate the extent to which you... Acted rudely toward someone at work.
Please rate the extent to which you... Publicly embarrassed someone at work.
Please rate the extent to which you... Took property from work without permission.
Please rate the extent to which you... Spent too much time fantasizing, daydreaming or surfing the internet instead of working.
Please rate the extent to which you... Falsified a receipt to get reimbursed for more money than spent on business expense.
Please rate the extent to which you... Took an additional or longer break than is acceptable at your workplace.
Please rate the extent to which you... Came in late to work without permission.
Please rate the extent to which you... Littered your work environment.
Please rate the extent to which you... Failed to follow your boss's instructions.
Please rate the extent to which you... Intentionally worked slower than you could have worked.
Please rate the extent to which you... Discussed confidential company information with an unauthorized individual.
Please rate the extent to which you... Used an illegal drug or consumed alcohol on the job when not allowed.
Please rate the extent to which you... Put little effort into your work.
Please rate the extent to which you... Dragged out work in order to get overtime.
Citizenship and Work Behaviors - Organizational Behavior Score
Notes: Sum of items x74ni_qa1 through x74ni_qa15; -99 = Missing

ElementDescription: Citizenship and Work Behaviors - Work Behavior Score
Notes: Sum of items x74ni_qb1 through x74ni_qb19; -99 = Missing
